Title: Etcd pkg Insecure ciphers are allowed by default
Description:
### Vulnerability type
Cryptography

### Detail
The TLS ciphers list supported by etcd by default contains weak ciphers.

### Workarounds
Provide a desired ciphers using the `--cipher-suites` flag as described with examples in the [security documentation](https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/blob/master/Documentation/op-guide/security.md)

### References
Find out more on this vulnerability in the [security audit report](https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/blob/master/security/SECURITY_AUDIT.pdf)

### For more information
If you have any questions or comments about this advisory:
* Contact the [etcd security committee](https://github.com/etcd-io/etcd/blob/master/security/security-release-process.md#product-security-committee-psc)
AffectedVersions: All versions before 3.3.23, all versions starting from 3.4.0-rc.0 up to 3.4.9
NotImpacted: All versions starting from 3.3.23 before 3.4.0-rc.0, all versions after 3.4.9
